query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Zooplankton biomass, diversity and trophic structure
result.description: Report describing an integrated view of the variability in zooplankton, biomass, diversity, size structure and trophic structure, including historical data from latitudinal cruises and seasonal variability obtained from time-series studies in specific areas. Both D2.1 (D4) and D2.2 (D5) will serve to streamline the transfer of historical data for interannual/interdecadal variability analysis by CT2 (WP6).
